# Eye Detection Configuration Values
# Generated by Cor Gaze Detection Library
# Last Updated: Auto-generated during calibration

# Haar Cascade Parameters
eye_cascade_scale_factor=1.1
# Scale factor for multi-scale detection (1.05 - 1.3)

eye_cascade_min_neighbors=5
# Minimum number of neighbor detections required (3 - 8)

eye_cascade_min_size_width=30
# Minimum eye detection width in pixels

eye_cascade_min_size_height=30
# Minimum eye detection height in pixels

# Eye Region Parameters
eye_region_width_factor=0.3
# Width factor for eye region relative to face (0.2 - 0.5)

eye_region_height_factor=0.4
# Height factor for eye region relative to face (0.3 - 0.6)

left_eye_offset_x=0
# Horizontal offset for left eye detection (pixels)

left_eye_offset_y=0
# Vertical offset for left eye detection (pixels)

right_eye_offset_x=0
# Horizontal offset for right eye detection (pixels)

right_eye_offset_y=0
# Vertical offset for right eye detection (pixels)

# Pupil Detection Parameters
pupil_detection_method=hough_circles
# Method: hough_circles, contour_detection, or template_matching

pupil_detection_threshold=50
# Threshold for pupil detection (20 - 100)

pupil_min_radius=5
# Minimum pupil radius in pixels

pupil_max_radius=30
# Maximum pupil radius in pixels

pupil_canny_threshold1=50
# Lower threshold for Canny edge detection

pupil_canny_threshold2=150
# Upper threshold for Canny edge detection

pupil_hough_accumulator_threshold=30
# Accumulator threshold for Hough circle detection

# Iris Detection Parameters
iris_detection_enabled=true
# Enable iris boundary detection

iris_min_radius=15
# Minimum iris radius in pixels

iris_max_radius=50
# Maximum iris radius in pixels

# Eye Shape Parameters
eye_ellipse_fitting=true
# Use ellipse fitting for eye boundary detection

eye_aspect_ratio_min=0.2
# Minimum eye aspect ratio for validation

eye_aspect_ratio_max=0.8
# Maximum eye aspect ratio for validation

# Quality Control Parameters
detection_confidence_threshold=0.7
# Minimum confidence score for valid detection (0.5 - 0.95)

temporal_smoothing_factor=0.3
# Temporal smoothing between frames (0.0 - 0.8)

outlier_rejection_enabled=true
# Enable outlier detection and rejection

max_eye_movement_per_frame=20
# Maximum allowed eye movement between frames (pixels)

# Advanced Parameters
subpixel_accuracy=true
# Enable subpixel accuracy for pupil center detection

adaptive_threshold_enabled=true
# Use adaptive thresholding for varying lighting conditions

histogram_equalization=false
# Apply histogram equalization for contrast enhancement

gaussian_blur_kernel_size=3
# Kernel size for Gaussian blur preprocessing (1, 3, 5, 7)

# Calibration Metadata
calibration_video_file=
# Source video file used for calibration

calibration_timestamp=
# Timestamp when calibration was performed

calibration_frame_count=20
# Number of frames used for calibration

# User identifier for calibration session
